name: css-empty-cells
description: Css module of single purpose classes for empty cells

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-empty-cells.css > css/css-empty-cells.css && tachyons src/css-empty-cells.css --minify > css/css-empty-cells.min.css && tachyons src/css-empty-cells.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
